titleStmt.title: A feast of fat things full of marrow containing several Scripture songs taken out of the Old and New Testaments, with others composed by t[he author] : together [with o]ne hundred of divine hymns, being the first century.
titleStmt.author: Keach, Benjamin, 1640-1704.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
Imperfect: some letters on t.p. illegible.
